EmailTemplate.description: Maintenance and account selector update release
EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes22B
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Changes Account selector and Account / Opportunity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This week's release includes bug fixes and performance improvements. In addition, this release contains an enhancement to our Account Selector Page and Account / Opportunity Record Types.
Account Selector Page - Create Account Buttons
There has been a new button added to the Account Selector Page labeled "Create Account and Don't Merge" This button allows NMD users to bypass the Account Auto Merge logic after the record has been created For non-NMD users this logic is disabled and the buttons are identical in function. Either button can used to bypass the Account Selector Page and create a new Account
Account / Opportunity Record Type Changes (Sales Reps Only)
Sales users will no longer be prompted with a selection page to select a Record Type when creating a new Account or Opportunity Instead, the Account or Opportunity Record Type will automatically update to the proper segment based on the "Number of Full-Time Employees" field value entered by the user (or based on the Unomy full-time employee count if the FTE field is left blank)
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at salesforcesupport@wework.com
Yours Truly, Susie Romero
